content: *go hands free with a quick project that will hold your phone up for you this handy wedge style crochet phone holder lets you watch videos with ease and it s perfect for gifting * > this pattern is part of my **30 last minute crochet gifts ebook** it s ad-free printer friendly and full of awesome gifts you can crochet in a jiffy >**get the ebook here 1 ** pattern is free with ads and a video tutorial on my website here 2 > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 500 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership here 3 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-gifts-made-easy-vol2/ ref=pattern 2 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet-phone-holder-wedge/ 3 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
